text: Natalya Vladimirovna Bochkareva (; 25 July 1980) is an Russian stage and movie actress and television presenter. == Biography == Natalya Vladimirovna Bochkareva was born in Gorky [now Nizhny Novgorod]. Both her parents died, her mother died at age 54 from complications after strokes and her father died at age 52 several years later. She has one sibling, younger sister Nadezhda Bochkareva. In 2000 she graduated from Nizhny Novgorod Theatre School, and in 2002 from Moscow Art Theatre School. == Career == She started her career in 1999 when played a small role in movie "Chinese service". Since 2006 she play main role Darya Bukina in TV series "Happy Together". It is an adaptation of series "Married ... With Children". She has been an actress with the Moscow Art Theatre since 2002. Since 2010, she also is a television presenter. == Personal life == On September 28, 2007 she married lawyer Nikolai Borisov.Нижегородская актриса Наталья Бочкарева вышла замуж They has a two children, son Ivan Borisov (born on January 4, 2007)Наталья Бочкарёва стала мамой and daughter Maria Borisova (born on February 22, 2008).Нижегородская актриса Наталья Бочкарева - знаменитая Даша Букина из популярного телесериала - почувствовала схватки в канун Дня защитника Отечества, 22 февраля. Natalya also has a stepdaughter, Alysa Borisova. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Russian stage actors Category:Russian movie actors Category:People from Nizhny Novgorod
title: Natalya Bochkareva
